system.description:
A high quality, woven carpet which is cursed to smother any who attempt to activate its magic.

  • Commanding: Any command issued to the rug by a character sitting on it activates its curse.

  • When activated: The rug rolls up tightly around the character and attempts to suffocate them.

  • Saving throw: The victim may save versus spells to avoid being suffocated.

  • Suffocating: The character suffocates in [[/r 1d4+2]] rounds.

  • Freeing the victim: @UUID[Compendium.ose-advancedfantasytome.spells.Item.r1nzPx4J12JY6TAO]{Dispel magic} causes the rug to release the victim.
